item.description:
FRI MAY 18 – Golda’s Balcony with Connecticut Theatre Group Pre-and After Party*ADV TIX DISCOUNT*

This is a Multi-Group Event

The story of one of the great women of our time. From an impoverished childhood in Russia to Prime Minister of Israel, Golda Meir's life is filled with mystery and breathtaking drama.

This intimate and compelling one-woman show invites you into the heart and mind of one of the 20th Century's great leaders.

"Seldom has history embodied itself in one person as clearly as it did in Golda Meir...Gibson gives us a great understanding of Golda's personal and public life and conveys magnificently the fearlessness and dedication that made Golda so powerful a world leader.' –New York Daily News

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Pre-Party starts at 6:30pm - Show starts at 8pm FREE SAFE PARKING

**RECEIVE A 15% DISCOUNT ON FOOD AND DRINK AT THE PRE-PARTY WITH YOUR TICKET**

Advance Tickets are $25 * Tickets are $30 at the event

Playhouse on Park

244 Park Road

West Hartford, CT 06119

 

EXIT 43 PARK ROAD off 84

Next to AC Petersons

 

Pick up your ticket before the show at the pre-Party with the Connecticut Theatre Group, or at the will call window

 

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP SECTION

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

 

Visit http://www.CTTheatre.org or call (860) 987-7888

Join the EntertainmentCT.com UPCOMING EVENTS Email Newsletter at http://www.EntertainmentCT.com/Email-Newsletter.htm
